subject: Exemption from levy of user fee for the vehicles hired by the State Government/Central Government
text: HTdu <THTy <TTHM wiferrut 104 Phone; 91-11-25074100/25074200 (a +ar7, H;r 4Rar7 &r (FuTT #T4) 44 /Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 9W7 $ National Highways Authority of India Wa, Extn = 2223 2318 2488 2563 (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport and Highways) M-5Q 6, 472t-10, ETrMT, #{farhf:110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI/ 13013/50/03-04/CMD-CO/Non-VIP (117) 29.11.2005 CIRCULAR NO. NHALCOMMERCIAL OPERATIONS/68 Sub Exemption from levy of user Iee for the vehicles hired by the Btate Government/ Central Government In continuation 'to our earlier circular no_ NHAI/COMMERCIAL OPERATIONS / 50 dated 10.11.04 regarding exemption from of user fee; it is further clarified that the vehicles hired by State Government[ Central Govemment cannot be treated as State Central Government vehicles and hence same will not bbe eligible for exemption from payment of user fee This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: TM Lohia) General Manager (CO) To All PIU/CMU NHAI Copy submitted for information to All Members All CGMs/CVO All GMs PS to Chairman Librarian z; mmlohia neelamlvip (Non-VIP)doc NHAL levy
